name: Haworthia
description: Haworthia is a compact, slow-growing succulent prized for its attractive rosette-shaped foliage, often featuring thick green leaves. Well suited for indoor environments, Haworthia thrives in bright indirect light and requires minimal watering, making it an excellent choice for desks, shelves, and small containers.
